facts.fact_text: Vietnam posted a trade deficit of USD 1.78 billion in January 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: Vietnam posted a trade deficit of USD 1.78 billion in January 2026

facts.fact_text: Vietnam's trade balance shifted from a USD 3.1 billion surplus in January 2024 to a USD 1.78 billion deficit in January 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: Vietnam posted a trade deficit of USD 1.78 billion in January 2026, shifting from a USD 3.1 billion surplus in the same month of 2024.

facts.fact_text: January 2026 marked the second straight month of trade deficit for Vietnam and the largest gap since February 2022.

evidences.evidence_text: It marked the second straight month of trade deficit and the largest gap since February 2022, as exports rose less than imports.

facts.fact_text: Vietnam's outbound shipments grew 29.7% year-on-year to USD 43.19 billion.

evidences.evidence_text: Outbound shipments grew 29.7% year-on-year to USD 43.19 billion

facts.fact_text: Vietnam's imports jumped 49.2% to USD 44.97 billion.

evidences.evidence_text: while imports jumped 49.2% to USD 44.97 billion.

facts.fact_text: Last year, Vietnam registered a trade surplus of USD 20.03 billion.

evidences.evidence_text: Last year, Vietnam registered a trade surplus of USD 20.03 billion

facts.fact_text: Last year, Vietnam's exports rose by 17.0%.

evidences.evidence_text: with exports and imports rising by 17.0% and 19.4%, respectively.

facts.fact_text: Last year, Vietnam's imports rose by 19.4%.

evidences.evidence_text: with exports and imports rising by 17.0% and 19.4%, respectively.
